description: List all permissions on a private CA, if any, granted to the Certificate Manager (ACM) service principal (acm.amazonaws.com). These permissions allow ACM to issue and renew ACM certificates that reside in the same Amazon Web Services account as the CA. Permissions can be granted with the CreatePermission action and revoked with the DeletePermission action.

parameters.name: CertificateAuthorityArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the private CA to inspect. You can find the ARN by calling the ListCertificateAuthorities action. This must be of the form: arn:aws:acm-pca:region:account:certificate-authority/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 You can get a private CA's ARN by running the ListCertificateAuthorities action.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: Summary information about each permission assigned by the specified private CA, including the action enabled, the policy provided, and the time of creation.

nested_items.name: CertificateAuthorityArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the private CA from which the permission was issued.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the permission was created.

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services service or entity that holds the permission. At this time, the only valid principal is acm.amazonaws.com.

nested_items.name: SourceAccount
nested_items.description: The ID of the account that assigned the permission.

nested_items.name: Actions
nested_items.description: The private CA actions that can be performed by the designated Amazon Web Services service.

nested_items.name: Policy
nested_items.description: The name of the policy that is associated with the permission.
